question:
You are going away from home for one week and you need to ask your neighbor to look after you house. 


Write a letter describe:•	Why you want to go away•	What you want your neighbor to look after•	If there are any problems, then give instructions
text: I am writing to thank you for accepting to manage my home during my absence period which will last till the 25th of the current month. Let me introduce myself, I am Ali Hammoud, and I have been settling in this flat for three years.

In fact, my boss sends me on a work mission outside the country, and it is considered very crucial to our company survival. Moreover, I will be presenting my firm in the financial exhibition where various potential products will be exposed this year.

The principal thing that I want you to take care of is my dog Jack who likes playing outside with a tennis ball. Plus, you will find animal food on the top of the refrigerator with a paper describing all the daily tasks required inside my accommodation for a one-week schedule.

Finally, I would suggest that you contact me in case of any inconvenient information mentioned on the note that I left for you. You also find my contact number nearby the telephone which you can use in case of emergencies.
Your prompt action is highly appreciated.
